import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import '../../pages/Home/Slideer/Slideer.css' import axios from 'axios' import Sidebar from '../../components/SideBar/Sidebar/Sidebar' import "../slider/Slider.Detail.css" import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const SliderDetail = () => { const history=useNavigate(); const [slider , setSlider] = useState([]) const slider_arr = slider && slider.map(item => { return item._id }) console.log(slider_arr) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/slider') .then(res => setSlider(res.data.sliders)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } , []) return (

Hello!




) } export default SliderDetail
